name: 血潭江湖百里荣
description:
Introduction:
The so-called happy Jianghu, but the moment of revenge to kill the enemy, the sword fell. What is more lasting is the perseverance of sharpening a sword in ten years, the melancholy after revenge, or the hatred of failing to revenge
(it's not that I don't write much, the problem is that I don't have a few words in the game...)


Operation:
Direction key move, Z key confirm, X cancel and archive (in fact, RM default operation, but I canceled the menu)


Features (?) :
Taste a Jianghu story and a few poems
2D horizontal screen with Chinese style
Self created fighting style
Listen to the authentic DLC music of RMVA (emm


(These words are translated by computer.)
